name: Peer Support
description: Peers.net provides 1:1 peer support for teenagers and young adults (ages 13-30). On our HIPAA-compliant telehealth platform, clients can get next day 1:1 confidential & non-judgmental support. We have certified peer supporters available every day 6am-10pm PST via chat, audio or video.
fullDescription: Peers.net provides 1:1 peer support for teenagers and young adults (ages 13-30). On our HIPAA-compliant telehealth platform, clients can get next day 1:1 confidential & non-judgmental support. We have certified peer supporters available every day 6am-10pm PST via chat, audio or video.

cost: This is a fee-based service. Insurance accepted, financial aid available.
